value.title: North America is seeing a hiring boom in retail industry machine learning roles
value.excerpt: North America extended its dominance for machine learning hiring among retail industry companies in the three months ending March. The number of roles in North America made up 77.1% of total machine learning jobs – up from 75% in the same quarter last year.

value.title: Railway industry companies are increasingly innovating in machine learning
value.excerpt: Research and innovation in machine learning in the railway equipment supply, product and services sector is on the rise.
